pubspec.yaml:
name: todo_modern_app
version: 1.0.0
description: Modern Todo List App
publish_to: 'none'
environment:
  sdk: '>=3.0.0 <4.0.0'
dependencies:
  flutter:
    sdk: flutter
  provider: ^6.0.5
  uuid: ^3.0.7
flutter:
  uses-material-design: true
lib/models/todo_model.dart: import 'package:flutter/material.dart';import 'package:uuid/uuid.dart';class Todo{final String id,title;bool done=false;Todo(this.title):id=Uuid().v4();}class TodoModel extends ChangeNotifier{final List<Todo> _todos=[];List<Todo> get todos=>_todos;void add(String title){_todos.add(Todo(title));notifyListeners();}void toggle(String id){final t=_todos.firstWhere((e)=>e.id==id);t.done=!t.done;notifyListeners();}void remove(String id){_todos.removeWhere((e)=>e.id==id);notifyListeners();}}
lib/screens/todo_screen.dart: import 'package:flutter/material.dart';import 'package:provider/provider.dart';import '../models/todo_model.dart';class TodoScreen extends StatelessWidget{const TodoScreen({super.key});@override Widget build(BuildContext c){final ctrl=TextEditingController();final todos=Provider.of<TodoModel>(c);return Scaffold(appBar:AppBar(title:const Text('Modern Todo')),body:Column(children:[Padding(padding:const EdgeInsets.all(8.0),child:Row(children:[Expanded(child:TextField(controller:ctrl,decoration:const InputDecoration(hintText:'Add Todo'))),IconButton(icon:const Icon(Icons.add),onPressed:(){if(ctrl.text.isNotEmpty){todos.add(ctrl.text);ctrl.clear();}})])),Expanded(child:ListView.builder(itemCount:todos.todos.length,itemBuilder:(ctx,i){final t=todos.todos[i];return ListTile(title:Text(t.title,style:TextStyle(decoration:t.done?TextDecoration.lineThrough:null)),leading:Checkbox(value:t.done,onChanged:(_)=>todos.toggle(t.id)),trailing:IconButton(icon:const Icon(Icons.delete),onPressed:()=>todos.remove(t.id)));}))]));}}
